lead_paragraph: Hal Robson-Kanu marked his first start for West Bromwich Albion by smashing in a spectacular goal to secure a 2-1 comeback Premier League win at Southampton on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Robson-Kanu Hits Winner in First West Brom Start
headline.main: Robson-Kanu Hits Winner in First West Brom Start

snippet: Hal Robson-Kanu marked his first start for West Bromwich Albion by smashing in a spectacular goal to secure a 2-1 comeback Premier League win at Southampton on Saturday....
